title: Decker
description: Men fear me. Women want to tame me.The only thing in my life that ever mattered was the MC...until Darla got dropped right in my lap.Her deadbeat old man tried to pawn her off to pay his debt to the club.Getting rid of him came as easy as tying my shoes.Getting rid of her isn't an option.It would be like ripping my heart out and feeding it to the dogs.I promised I'd never let a woman turn me soft or make me weak, but I've never met a woman like her before. She's mine forever now, even if she doesn't know it yet.Decker is book 4 in the Dead Ringers MC series, a brother of loyal and brutal bikers who will stop at nothing to protect their patch and the women they love Guaranteed HEA, high steam, and appearances from all your favorite Dead Ringers characters await!
author: Deja Voss
